name: Blazed and Confused
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Carolyn Omine, William Wright
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: When sadistic temporary teacher Jack Lassen gives Bart a humiliating haircut Bart plans revenge. His opportunity comes when he discovers that Lassen is about to light the Blazing Guy effigy at a hippie camp-site. He contrives to get the family on holiday there and to wreck Lassen's big moment.
